entry.title: Adding A Side Menu To My Website & Building A Pricing Tool

link.title: Adding A Side Menu To My Website & Building A Pricing Tool

entry.content:
Yesterday I finally got around to adding a side menu for mobile devices to my website.

After testing it and working out the bugs, it's up and functional; how it looks is a work in progress.

Biulding A Website Pricing Tool

Another projects I managed to get started on earlier was putting some code together for a pricing tool I've had in mind for a while now. I'm going to be hosting this little application on my website for anyone to use, especially for people intrested in get an estimate on developing a website for their business/personal project.

After doing doing some research I was finally able to find the right combination of HTML and JavaScript that does exactly what I need. The code that I Frankensteined takes all the selected values from the inputs in an HTML form and with a little bit of JavaScript it summizes all the selected values and displays a total at the bottom at the click of a button. 'Website Pricing Tool'

Future Plans For This Tool I'm Building

While it is just a skeleton right now, in the near future I will be adding things like icons and animations to make it as interactive and engaging as possible.
entry.summary: Spent yesterday adding a side menu to my website and currently building out a pricing tool that can help you estimate how much a website is going to cost based on relative information.

entry.title: How to Get Your Website On Google

link.title: How to Get Your Website On Google

entry.content:
How to Get Your Website on Google

Getting your website on Google is not as hard as you think, it's actually simple.

Head Over To Google Search Console

In order to get your website online youre going to want to head over to Google Search Console

Their you can follow the process which will initially ask you to type in the domain of your website.

Google Will Ask You To Verify Your Domain

From their Google will check it's availibailty. If is currently not in use in their system they'll provide you with a .TXT file that you'll need to place in the domain name settings of your website. This file has a unique code that Google will be able to detect and veryfiy that the domain you submitted does infact belong to you.

Verify Your Domain With Google Search Console

Their are several ways to verify your domain, the easiest for me has been the way google initally suggests.

Expect To Wait About A Day

This process can take about a day to complete so be a little bit patient. Once done you can expect to start seeing analytics about how Google is using your website.

Author
Ruben Gutierrez

Ruben Gutierrez is a technology enthusiast from the Greater Los Angeles, California, area.

entry.title: What is a website and what can it do?

link.title: What is a website and what can it do?

entry.content:
What Is A Website & What Can It Help Me Do

A website is a collection of web pages made by a person or a group that are all under the same domain.

What exactly is a website?

Like most application websites are compiled into a folder and uploaded onto servers

What types of files make up a website?

Website are usually compromised of several diffrent types of files but the 3 most common types of files you'll find in a website are HTML, CSS, and javascript.

entry.title: Reading Is Awesome It Can Help Improve Your Life & Can Also Keep You From Going Crazy

link.title: Reading Is Awesome It Can Help Improve Your Life & Can Also Keep You From Going Crazy

entry.content:
Like most kids I never really enjoyed reading when I was younger. To me it was just another task that got in the way of me clashing inanimate ojects and making fighting noises.

A lot of the time when I was expected to be reading I would just use my pointing finger and scan the pages to give whoever was looking after me the idea that I was paying attentiopn.

You can only pretend to read for so long until your brain forces you to try to understand the letters and words infront of you.

Eventually my parents got me my own computer and dial-up internet and my obsecsision with knowing a lot about things I was intrested became a positive. Now a days we take our ability to consume productive and useful content whenever we want gets taken for granted and how could you not with so much distracting programs so readily available.

Learning To Read Out of Anxiety

All this just to say that reading is important and if you want a carear in programming or technology it's a must. A lot of the problems you'll be addressing in the tech industry don't have 2 hours long videos where someone properly describes you're exact situation.

Does Anyone Even Read Anymore

One of the reasons I really enjoy reading is because it helps lead you're mind on a new path. When you read it's quite easy to get distracted and that one of the main reasons I enjoy doing it so much. down a lot of the voices in your head that can keep you idle.

Reading has helped me learn so many skills I would have not otherwise had. It's helped me gain new perspectives and allowed me to empathies with people who'm I might have just walked by.

Whenever you find yourself in a sea of contratdictions just take a deep breathe and try to focus on something you like. Once you have something in mind try and ask some questions about that subject. If you find your.
entry.summary: Reading has helped me learn so many skills I would have not otherwise had. It's helped me gain new perspectives and allowed me to empathies with people who'm I might have just walked by.

entry.title: How To Make A Website
entry.content:
How To Make A Website

In this guide I'll be showing you how to make the most basic website so that you can get a better understanding of the fundmaelts and basic concepts behind web design.

Let's start with the basics. What is a website? A website is a grouping of webpages but a group or people under the same domain.

Visual Studio Code A Really Good Text Editor

In order to start writing code you're going to need a text editor. I suggest installing Visual Studio Code because it provides you with a lot of useful tools, but any of them will do.

Step 1: Create A Folder

The first thing you're going to be doing is creating a folder somehwere on your desktop for easy access.The process is the same for both Windows & Mac. To create a folder you need to right click on yourscroll down to "New" and click itI suggest right clicking on your desktop and heading down t up the folder in your text editor.

Step 2: Creating An HTML File

The main type of file you'll be using when you're building websites are .HTML files.

Hyper Text Markup Language is a coding langauge that is used to give structure and render information.

What is an HTML file?

entry.title: Your Fear of Failing Is Keeping You From Making Money

link.title: Your Fear of Failing Is Keeping You From Making Money

entry.content:
Being a self-taught programmer, the fear of failing was a big part of my story, especially in the early days. I'd constantly be questioning myself, "Am I learning the right thing?" "Am I Googling the right questions?" the thoughts seemed endless.

Don't Let Your Fears Make You Hesitate, Just Keep Trying

Lucky for you, I've dug myself out of one of those dark, depressing holes and can confidently tell you things are not as hard as they initially appear.  If there's one piece of advice I can give you as someone who's been doing this online stuff for a while it's don't let your fear of failing stop you from doing what you want.

It can seem tough right now, especially if you're at the beginning of your journey, but the truth is the more you fail the more you can see analyze the situation to see where you it went wrong. This you get a better understanding of these programs with a ton of moving parts.

Programing Is Actually A Lot Easier Than You Think

Programming and code, especially the way it's perceived in popular culture, makes you think, "I could never do that." 

The truth is that not all programming is hard. Don't get me wrong; this definitely is a field of programming that requires a high level of understanding, but for the most part, anyone with a little bit of time on their hands can pick up some pretty basic skills that could substantially improve their lives.
entry.summary: The fear of failing and messing things ups can keep you from doing what you want to do. Even worse if you let those thoughts linger for too long you'll become paralyzed and you can suddenly feel like your in the passenger seat of your own life.

entry.title: Finalizing Landing Page & Messing Around W/ ChatGPT & 11ty

link.title: Finalizing Landing Page & Messing Around W/ ChatGPT & 11ty

entry.content:
Today I spent the day putting the final touches on a landing page I'm building to try and get some clients through paid ads.

Building A Simple Website Using Chat GPT & 11ty

I'm probably a little late to this but better late than never especially in the technology world. Admitely when I first used ChatGPT I would ask it silly questions but after a while of watch the way programmers where using it I decided to give it a try and I have to say I'm pleasantly suprised.

Lately I've been contemplating on moving my website over to a static site generator called 11ty

Earlier this week without thought I went over to ChatGPT.com and began writing.
